Drop folder here or click to select: Dartu folder ɗoo maa tappu ngam suɓaade
Click the button below or drag a folder: Tappu boggol ɗo les nder maa dartu folder ɗoo
No images found in selected folder and s: Alaa suuraaji ɗe njiytaa nder folder suɓaama e folder ɗiɗi
Alaa suuraaji ngam hollude. Suɓo folder.
Try using B, V, H, R, and G keys to expe: Ɗaɓɓitaa huutoree B, V, H, R, e G ngam ɗaɓɓude e golle nder logo.
Press Space to start new session: Tappu Space ngam fuɗɗude sessiyon kesal
Are you sure you want to move the file t: Aanii aɗa tiiɗɗi yaltude fiilde to bin?
No more valid images found in the folder: Alaa suuraaji goɗɗi moƴƴi ɗe njiytaa nder folder.
About GestArt Text:
GestArt ko jokkondiral suuraaji ɗe waɗi ngam wallude artist ɗi ɗaɓɓude jaaynde gesture, sketch pose, e njiyde suuraaji jeytinde.

Duuɗi ɗuuɗi, mi huutori program goɗɗo e mi alaa yidde e nder ɓurɗe. Goonga ko, mi anndaa no waɗde koode e hoore am. Mi huutori ɗuuɗi ɗuuɗi e AI, ɗo ɗuuɗi ɗuuɗi ɓuɗɗi program fof, kono jooni aɗa woodi program ɗoo ɗo AI winndi e dow miijuki am. O laɓɓi waɗde program fof open-source, ndiyam ngam huutore, yaltude e waylude.

Jogiiɗe: Miijuki - LeonWGal; Koode - Cursor; Dawol countdown - Mixkit; Ikon - Tabler

Ɗo les ɗoo ko jokke am ɗo aɗa seɗɗaade wallude am maa wallude am. Miɗo foti jertude maa ko mi artist NSFW ɓurɗe, tawa miɗo foti eɓɓo.
Instructions Text:
Dawngal Kala:
• Space - Dillude/Fuɗɗi timer
• Jokke koose/nano - Suuraaɗo adino/Caggal
• S - Dilli suuraaɗo jooni
• Delete - Yaltu suuraaɗo jooni to bin

Dawngal Suuraaɗo:
• Lollor mouse maa +/- - Zoom in/out
• Tappu e dartu - Pan tuma zoom
• B - Sewndu ɓale e dannde
• V - Walwude vertical
• H - Walwude horizontal
• R - Walwude 90°
• Backspace - Walwude golle suuraaɗo fof

Teyte Dammugal:
• G - Walwude grid jeytinde
• T - Hollu/Suudu timer
• A - Walwude 'Kala e nder kala'
• O - Uddi suuraaɗo jooni
• C - Natnu suuraaɗo to clipboard
• Ctrl+, - Uddi teelte
